Text: R newbie question polr and glmcontrolPST Im running polr and getting warning messages from glmfit It seems reasonable to use glmcontrol to turn on the trace and follow what glmfit does when called by polr or is it glmcontrolmaxit traceTRUE polract datamm The glmcontrol sets the trace TRUE but theres no change in the output from polr Many thanks in advance for any helppointers rhelp mailing list Read hornikRRFAQhtml Send info help or unsubscribe in the body not the subject To
